Mom's Banana Bread

Ingredients

  • 1 cup sugar
  • 2 eggs
  • 1 stick butter
  • 2 bananas
  • 1 tsp vanilla extract
  • 1 1‚ÅÑ2 cup flour
  • 1‚ÅÑ4 tsp salt
  • 1 tsp baking soda
  • 1‚ÅÑ2 tsp baking powder
  • 1‚ÅÑ2 cup chopped walnuts

Instructions

  1. Preheat oven to 350¬∞F.
  2. Cream together sugar, eggs, margarine, bananas, and vanilla.
  3. Sift together flour, salt, baking soda, and baking powder. Add to wet ingredients.
  4. Fold in walnuts.
  5. Grease & flour an 8√ó4" loaf pan.
  6. Bake for 50-55 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
